actors.name: for user
actors.sentence: {"introduction": {"purpose": "to integrate 3 faculties' databases and provide a web interface for users to access and manage the integrated inventory", "scope": "to provide a unified university inventory system (UUIS) for managing assets and spaces", "definitions": ["unified university inventory system (UUIS)", "technology-independent", "business terminology"]}, "system_overview": {"description": "a web-based system for managing university assets and spaces", "features": ["asset management", "space management", "request management", "reporting"]}, "functional_requirements": {"user_requirements": ["transferring assets", "editing assets", "creating requests", "approving requests"], "system_requirements": ["authentication", "authorization", "search", "reporting"]}, "non_functional_requirements": {"performance": ["availability during working hours", "response time < 1 minute"], "security": ["user authentication", "role-based access control", "data encryption"], "usability": ["easy to use", "clear and consistent terminology", "learning time < 4 hours"]}, "use_cases": {"actors": ["inventory admin", "user", "administrator"], "descriptions": ["modify asset", "create request", "approve request", "search asset"]}, "system_interfaces": {"user_interfaces": ["web interface", "search interface", "reporting interface"], "hardware_interfaces": ["servers", "databases"], "software_interfaces": ["operating system", "web browser"]}, "constraints": ["availability during working hours", "compatibility with microsoft and unix platforms", "backup and maintenance operations"]}
